PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_VegetationCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for vegetation and plants, modelled as instances of IfcGeographicElement with the predefined type set to VEGETATION.

PropertyDef.Name: BotanicalName
PropertyDef.Definition: Formal scientific name conforming to the International Code of Nomenclature for algae, fungi, and plants (ICN)

PropertyDef.Name: LocalName
PropertyDef.Definition: The local name that the plant is known as.
